CustomField.description: If an opportunity is won or better, the field shows a 1. If the opportunity is lost, the field shows a 0
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(BEGINS(TEXT(StageName),'Sold')),1, IF(OR(TEXT(StageName) == 'Not Sold', TEXT(StageName) == 'Lost', TEXT(StageName) == 'No Decision', TEXT(StageName) == 'Rejected',TEXT(StageName) == 'Disqualified',TEXT(StageName) == 'Rescinded'),0, NULL ))
CustomField.label: Closed Value
